name: Aloe Vera
description: A hardy succulent valued for its soothing gel and easy care.

careGuide.light: Bright, indirect light or gentle morning sun.
careGuide.water: Water every 2–3 weeks; allow soil to dry completely.

shippingDetails: Delivered within 5-7 business days in eco-friendly packaging.

name: Jade Plant
description: A long-lived succulent with thick, oval leaves; great for desks and windowsills.

careGuide.light: Bright light with a few hours of direct sun.
careGuide.water: Water when the top 2–3 cm of soil is dry.

shippingDetails: Delivered within 5-7 business days in eco-friendly packaging.

name: Haworthia Zebra Plant
description: A compact, striped succulent that thrives in low to medium light.

careGuide.light: Bright, indirect light; tolerates lower light indoors.
careGuide.water: Water lightly every 2–3 weeks; avoid soggy soil.

shippingDetails: Delivered within 5-7 business days in eco-friendly packaging.

name: Echeveria
description: A rosette-forming succulent with fleshy leaves in soft pastel tones.

careGuide.light: Full sun to bright indirect light.
careGuide.water: Water sparingly; let soil dry fully between waterings.

shippingDetails: Delivered within 5-7 business days in eco-friendly packaging.

name: Barrel Cactus
description: A round, ribbed cactus with prominent spines; a striking low-maintenance accent.

careGuide.light: Full sun; place in the brightest spot available.
careGuide.water: Water monthly in the growing season; very little in winter.

shippingDetails: Delivered within 5-7 business days in eco-friendly packaging.
